St._Paul.James Griffin Stadium:
James Griffin Stadium is a 4,367-capacity stadium in Saint Paul, Minnesota, USA.


== History ==
Although it is located on the grounds of Saint Paul Central High School, It also is a venue for two high schools in the Saint Paul public school district who do not have a football stadium of their own; Como Park and Johnson. It was also home the Concordia University football and women's soccer teams until 2008 as well as the Hamline University football for one season while their stadium was rebuilt.
The stadium was home to the Minnesota Thunder from 2004 through May 12, 2008.
